title: Investigation of Antifungal and Anticancer Property of Zinc Oxide Nanoparticles Prepared Through Bioinspired Synthesis Using Endophytic Streptomyces Derived from Halophyte
abstract: Zinc oxide nanoparticles (ZnO-NPs) are recognized as highly promising materials with applications in diverse fields, from therapeutics to agriculture. Hence, the present study aimed to biosynthesize ZnO-NPs employing the endophytic
